#summary authenticateREST.php
#labels authenticate,REST,authenticateREST,php,API

=authenticateREST.php=

==Files Included==
{{{
require_once('configREST.php');     //sql connection information
require_once('bootstrapREST.php');  //link information
}}}
<br>
*Input:* {{{https://[URL]/Authenticate.php?u=[username]&password=[pass]}}}<br>

*Output:* XML
  *   result  {{{[0 or 1]}}}  if user and pass is correct<br>
  *   key     {{{[hashed key]}}} validate auth was performed on this WS<br>
<br>
*Example Output:*<br>
  {{{
<?xml version="1.0"?>
      <result>    1       </result>
      <key>       fb504a91465213203ae7c3866bbf3cf4</key>
      <userID>    12345   </userID>
      <AccessType>400     </type>
}}}
<br>
==Functions==
*Function:*
{{{
function doService()
}}}
*Description:*<br>
Authenticates user, returns error if unsuccessful, and makes note of the result.<br>
<br>
<br>
*Function:*
{{{
function outputXML($errNum, $errMsgArr, $memberInfo)
}}}
*Description:*<br>
Outputs authentication result in XML. Calls
{{{
logToDB()
}}}
to log the result.
<br>
